languages.text: "На Футфоле каждый третий — из касбаллитов, но это не значит, что весь этот гнилой сброд действует сообща — меня не единожды подставляли конкуренты. Однако к клиентам {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} благосклонна — если есть чем платить, вам раздобудут, организуют, транспортируют все, что пожелаете. Клиент всегда прав, если клиент не крыса. В противном случае..." {n}Джай с патетическим вздохом разводит руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "На Футфоле каждый третий — из касбаллитов, но это не значит, что весь этот гнилой сброд действует сообща — меня не единожды подставляли конкуренты. Однако к клиентам {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} благосклонна — если есть чем платить, вам раздобудут, организуют, транспортируют все, что пожелаете. Клиент всегда прав, если клиент не крыса. В противном случае..." {n}Джай с патетическим вздохом разводит руками.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: "На Футфоле каждый третий — из касбаллитов, но это не значит, что весь этот гнилой сброд действует сообща — меня не единожды подставляли конкуренты. Однако к клиентам {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} благосклонна — если есть чем платить, вам раздобудут, организуют, транспортируют все, что пожелаете. Клиент всегда прав, если клиент не крыса. В противном случае..." {n}Джай с патетическим вздохом разводит руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballite, but it does not mean all this rotten filth is acting together — the competitors went out of their way to frame me more than once. And yet Kasballica is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organized, transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and makes a meaningful gesture.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “在落脚港，每三个人里就有一个人为卡斯巴利卡做事。不过，这并不意味着那群烂人会团结一心。我曾不止一次遭到陷害，仅仅是因为卡斯巴利卡的某个成员打算压他的竞争对手一头。不过，{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}对客户始终都很慷慨。只要你能承担得起他们的价格，他们便可以为你弄到任何东西，运到你面前。顾客永远是对的，除非顾客碰巧是个二五仔。如果是这种情况……”{n}婕伊叹了口气，举起了手。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在落脚港，每三个人里就有一个人为卡斯巴利卡做事。不过，这并不意味着那群烂人会团结一心。我曾不止一次遭到陷害，仅仅是因为卡斯巴利卡的某个成员打算压他的竞争对手一头。不过，{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}对客户始终都很慷慨。只要你能承担得起他们得价格，他们便可以为你弄到任何东西，运到你面前。顾客永远是对的，除非顾客碰巧是个二五仔。如果是这种情况……”{n}婕伊叹了口气，举起了手。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the Kasballica is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

languages.text: «Un tercio de Paso trabaja para la Kasballica, pero eso no significa que todos ellos trabajen en equipo: como escoria putrefacta que son, más de una vez me la han jugado para que un agente obtenga una victoria sobre sus rivales. Aun así, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} es generosa con sus clientes, siempre que puedan permitirse sus servicios. Todo se puede obtener, organizar y transportar por el precio adecuado. El cliente siempre tiene la razón, a menos que sea un chivato, en cuyo caso...». {n}Jae suspira y levanta las manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un tercio de Paso trabaja para la Kasballica, pero eso no significa que todos ellos trabajen en equipo: como escoria putrefacta que son, más de una vez me la han jugado para que un agente obtenga una victoria sobre sus rivales. Aun así, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} es generosa con sus clientes, siempre que puedan permitirse sus servicios. Todo se puede obtener, organizar y transportar por el precio adecuado. El cliente siempre tiene la razón, a menos que sea un chivato, en cuyo caso...». {n}Jae suspira y levanta las manos.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「フットフォールでは3人に1人がカスバリカだが、だからといって腐った汚物どもが一緒に行動しているわけではない。カスバリカがライバルを出し抜くために、あたしは何度も計画を立てた。でも、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}は顧客に対して寛大だ…あんたに余裕があるならね。適切な値段さえ出せば、どんなものでも手に入り、組織化され、輸送される。客は常に正しい。たまたまネズミだった場合は別だけどね…」{n}ジェイはため息をつき、両手を上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールでは3人に1人がカスバリカだが、だからといって腐った汚物どもが一緒に行動しているわけではない。カスバリカがライバルを出し抜くために、あたしは何度も計画を立てた。でも、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}は顧客に対して寛大だ…あんたに余裕があるならね。適切な値段さえ出せば、どんなものでも手に入り、組織化され、輸送される。客は常に正しい。たまたまネズミだった場合は別だけどね…」{n}ジェイはため息をつき、両手を上げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Jeder Dritte auf Footfall gehört zur Kasballica, doch das heißt nicht, dass dieses widerliche Pack zusammenarbeitet. Ich habe wurde schon viele Male hereingelegt, nur damit ein Kasballica-Mitglied seine Rivalen übertrumpfen kann. Und doch ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ihren Kunden gegenüber großzügig — wenn man es sich leisten kann. Für den richtigen Preis lässt sich alles beschaffen, organisieren und transportieren. Der Kunde hat immer recht. Es sei denn, er ist eine Ratte, dann ..." {n}Jae seufzt und schlägt die Hände über dem Kopf zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Dritte auf Footfall gehört zur Kasballica, doch das heißt nicht, dass dieses widerliche Pack zusammenarbeitet. Ich habe wurde schon viele Male hereingelegt, nur damit ein Kasballica-Mitglied seine Rivalen übertrumpfen kann. Und doch ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ihren Kunden gegenüber großzügig — wenn man es sich leisten kann. Für den richtigen Preis lässt sich alles beschaffen, organisieren und transportieren. Der Kunde hat immer recht. Es sei denn, er ist eine Ratte, dann ..." {n}Jae seufzt und schlägt die Hände über dem Kopf zusammen.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Un bon tiers des habitants de Castel fait partie de la Kasballica, mais ça ne veut pas dire que toutes ces pourritures agissent de concert. Je me suis fait piéger plus d'une fois par d'autres membres qui me considéraient comme leur rivale. Cela dit, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} sait faire preuve de générosité à l'égard de ses clients... de ceux qui peuvent se le permettre, en tout cas. Ils peuvent obtenir, organiser et transporter tout ce que vous voulez, tant que vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à y mettre le prix. Le client est roi, sauf s'il s'agit d'un rat, et dans ce cas-là... » {n}Jae soupire et lève les mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un bon tiers des habitants de Castel fait partie de la Kasballica, mais ça ne veut pas dire que toutes ces pourritures agissent de concert. Je me suis fait piéger plus d'une fois par d'autres membres qui me considéraient comme leur rivale. Cela dit, la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} sait faire preuve de générosité à l'égard de ses clients... de ceux qui peuvent se le permettre, en tout cas. Ils peuvent obtenir, organiser et transporter tout ce que vous voulez, tant que vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à y mettre le prix. Le client est roi, sauf s'il s'agit d'un rat, et dans ce cas-là... » {n}Jae soupire et lève les mains.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Binliman'ın üçte biri Kasballicalıdır. Fakat sakın bu çürük şerefsizlerin hepsi birlikte çalışıyor sanma. Birkaç Kasballicalının rakiplerini elemine etmek için beni kullandığı oldu. Bunlara rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, cüzdanı kalın her müşterisine cömerttir. Parasını ödeyebiliyorsan her şey elde edilebilir, düzenlenebilir ve taşınabilir. Müşteri her zaman haklıdır. Sıçanın tekiyse başka. O zaman..." {n}Jae, iç çekip ellerini savuruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every third person on Footfall is a Kasballican, but that doesn't mean all that rotten filth is acting together — I've been set up more than once just so some Kasballican can get one over on his rivals. And yet the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} is generous to its customers — if you can afford it. Anything can be obtained, organised, and transported for the right price. The customer is always right, unless they happen to be a rat, in which case..." {n}Jae sighs and throws up her hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın üçte biri Kasballica'dır ama yanlış anlama, bütün bu çürümüş pisliklerin hepsi bir arada hareket ediyor diye bir şey yok. Birkaç Kasballica'nın rakiplerini elemine etmek için beni kullandığı durumlar başıma geldi. Bunlara rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, müşterilerine karşı cömerttir. Cüzdanın yeterince kalınsa tabii. Fiyatını ödeyebiliyorsan her şey elde edilebilir, düzenlenebilir ve taşınabilir. Müşteri her zaman haklıdır. Tabii sıçanın teki olmadıkları sürece. Bu duruda..." {n}Jae iç çekiyor ve ellerini savuruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
